titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3579) making emergency supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1998, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-473, by Mr. Goss.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3579 with 1 hour and 30 minutes of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Specified amendments are in order. Amendments printed in part 1 of the report accompanying this resolution shall be considered as adopted in the House and in the Committee of the Whole. No other amendment shall be in order except the further amendment printed in part 2 of the report.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 164.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 199 (Roll No. 85).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/31/1998--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (modified closed) for the consideration of H.R. 3579 (emergency supplemental appropriations).
